poses.filename: Pin on Mannen mode  Mens fashion.png
poses.description: A male model captured in a dynamic, full-body walking pose, angled at 3/4. One hand is in a pocket while the other holds a pair of sunglasses. The body weight is shifted forward, suggesting movement, with one leg bent as if stepping. The head is turned slightly towards the camera, giving an energetic and confident vibe, suitable for editorial or campaign imagery.

The subject is standing in a wide stance, facing forward with a slight lean. Arms are relaxed and positioned at the sides. The head is tilted slightly forward, conveying a confident and bold mood. Hair is slightly tousled, suggesting movement that adds dynamic energy to the pose. The overall look is strong and editorial, fitting for a fashion campaign.

The subject is standing with a full-body visible from a frontal view. One knee is slightly bent, creating a weight-shifted posture. The arms are in a relaxed position with one arm slightly forward. The head is tilted slightly, looking directly ahead. The mood is confident and styled for an editorial campaign.

The female model is standing in a confident and dynamic pose. She faces a 3/4 angle with her left hand on her hip and her right arm raised, touching her face. Her weight is shifted onto her back leg, with the front leg bent, creating a strong line. The head is slightly tilted back, adding to the confidence of the pose. The overall mood is editorial with high energy.

The female model is shown in a full-body pose with a dynamic and editorial energy. She stands with her body at a 3/4 angle, slightly leaning with a weight-shifted posture. Her arms are relaxed, with her hands in her pockets. Her head is tilted with a confident expression, and her legs are set wide apart, enhancing the dynamic quality of the pose.

The male model is standing in a full-body pose at a 3/4 angle. His arms are relaxed at his sides, with fingers slightly splayed. He is slightly leaning, creating a dynamic weight shift. His head is slightly turned, giving an editorial and confident vibe. The mood is bold and stylish, ideal for a fashion campaign.

The subject is standing in a confident pose with a 3/4 angle towards the camera. One knee is bent slightly, adding a dynamic aspect to the stance. The hands are casually in the pockets, and the weight is shifted to one leg, giving a relaxed yet stylish look. The head is slightly tilted, enhancing the confident demeanor, typical of an editorial or lookbook style.

poses.filename: Pin on Sesion de fotos visión.png
poses.description: The subject is a male model standing in a full-body pose. He faces forward with a slightly turned torso, exuding confidence. His arms are relaxed at his sides with a slight bend, and his weight is shifted to one leg. His head is slightly tilted with eyes looking forward, conveying a poised and editorial mood. The setting is minimal, focusing attention on the model's pose and expression.

The male subject is in a standing position, captured from a three-quarter perspective with a frontal viewpoint. One arm is relaxed and resting by his side, while the other hand is raised to lightly touch his neck. His head is slightly tilted with a confident and intense expression, adding to the editorial feel. The weight is evenly distributed, conveying a poised and confident stance.

The pose features a person standing in a full-body 3/4-angle view. They are facing slightly to the side with arms resting naturally at the sides. The weight is shifted to one leg, creating a relaxed yet poised stance. Head is slightly tilted down, contributing to a contemplative, editorial mood. The overall energy is sophisticated and suitable for a fashion campaign.

The model stands in a full-body pose facing the camera with a relaxed demeanor. Arms are placed behind the back with hands in pockets. The head is slightly tilted to one side, and weight is shifted to one leg, creating a subtle curve in the body posture. The overall mood is cool and relaxed, suitable for editorial fashion photography.

The subject is standing in a confident, full-body pose with a frontal view. Arms are positioned with hands in pockets, creating a relaxed yet assertive stance. The body weight is shifted slightly onto one leg, enhancing the angular and dynamic aspect of the pose. The head is slightly tilted, projecting a confident and poised mood suitable for an editorial or campaign setting.

The model stands on a platform with a slight forward lean. Her full body is visible, and the pose presents a frontal angle with her head slightly tilted. One arm is relaxed and slightly bent at the elbow, while the other arm hangs at her side. The weight is shifted in a dynamic and editorial manner, contributing to a confident and stylized appearance.

The pose features a full-body, 3/4-angle view with the model standing. One knee is bent, crossing slightly over the other leg, creating a dynamic and confident stance. The upper body leans back slightly, with arms relaxed, one hand tucked into a coat pocket. The head is slightly tilted, adding a sense of movement and edginess. The weight is shifted primarily onto one leg, contributing to the overall editorial and campaign energy of the pose. The mood is confident and fashion-forward.

The model is positioned in a full-body 3/4-angle stance while standing. Their weight is predominantly on one leg, giving a confident air. One arm is crossed and touching the opposite arm, creating a dynamic and engaging pose. The head is tilted slightly, adding to the editorial vibe.

The person is standing in a full-body pose with a slight profile orientation, facing slightly to the side with a neutral head angle. Their arms are relaxed at their sides, and their weight is shifted onto one leg, creating a subtle dynamism in the stance. The overall mood is editorial, conveying confidence and style, suitable for a lookbook setting.

The pose features a female model in a full-body view, standing with a confident demeanor. She faces the camera directly with her hands resting on her hips. Her weight is shifted to one side, creating a subtle curve in the body line. The pose exudes a sense of strength and assuredness, with a direct gaze forward. It is suitable for editorial or campaign shoots, capturing a fashion-forward, dynamic energy.

The male model stands in a full-body pose with a 3/4 angle to the camera. One knee is bent, creating a dynamic stance. One hand is in the pocket of his pants, while the other arm is raised slightly with fingers relaxed. His head is turned slightly to engage with the camera, exuding a confident and editorial mood. The weight is subtly shifted, adding a casual elegance to the pose.

The model stands in a dynamic full-body pose with a wide stance and weight shifted to one leg. Her upper body leans slightly forward, creating a confident and editorial feel. The arms are positioned to the sides, creating movement in the oversized garment. Her head is tilted slightly left with a direct gaze towards the camera, enhancing the powerful mood of the pose.

poses.filename: Pin on reference poses for art.png
poses.description: The subject is standing in a three-quarter pose with a strong and confident demeanor. Both hands are placed firmly on the hips, elbows pointed outward, adding to the assertive stance. The subject faces forward, chin slightly tucked downward, giving an intense and thoughtful look. The weight is evenly distributed on both legs, contributing to a stable and balanced posture. The overall mood of the pose is editorial, with an emphasis on confidence and style.

The subject is standing with a slight weight shift, creating an asymmetrical stance. Both arms are raised above the head, with hands clasped, giving the pose a relaxed yet confident energy. The head is slightly tilted, with a direct gaze forward. The mood is editorial, emphasizing style and attitude.

The model is standing at a three-quarter angle with her body slightly leaning backward, creating a dynamic and confident posture. Her arms are relaxed at her sides, one knee is slightly bent, and her weight is shifted to one side. Her head is turned, gazing over her shoulder, which adds an element of intrigue. The overall mood is editorial and dynamic, ideal for fashion campaigns.

The subject stands confidently with a full-body frontal pose. One knee is subtly bent, giving a natural curve to the stance. One arm is raised and bent, with the hand resting behind the head, while the other arm is positioned with hand gently touching the waist. The head is held high with a direct forward gaze, adding to the confident and poised energy of the pose.

The model is standing with a three-quarter body pose, facing the camera directly. One hand is casually placed in the pants pocket, while the other hand is raised to touch the face, conveying a pensive or contemplative mood. The weight is shifted slightly to one side, adding to a confident and editorial feel. The pose exudes a relaxed yet assertive energy.

The model is standing with a full-body pose, facing the camera directly. Her arms are raised and her head is slightly tilted with hair flowing, suggesting movement. She has a dynamic and lively energy, capturing a sense of exuberance and confidence. The weight appears evenly distributed, and the pose is suitable for a campaign setting.

The male model is standing in a full-body pose with a relaxed demeanor. His weight is shifted to one side, creating an easy-going and casual look. One hand is in his pocket while the other arm hangs loosely by his side. The posture is slightly leaning forward, and the head is tilted slightly downward. The overall mood is relaxed and editorial, with a subdued energy that suggests confidence and nonchalance.

poses.filename: Womens Laquan Smith Spring Summer 2026 Collection  Moda Operandi.png
poses.imagePath: /assets/poses/Womens Laquan Smith Spring Summer 2026 Collection  Moda Operandi.png
poses.description: The model is standing in a full-body pose with a frontal view. One knee is slightly bent while the other leg is straight, suggesting a confident, poised stance. Her arms are positioned with hands on hips, emphasizing the waist and creating an hourglass silhouette. The head is facing forward with a direct gaze, exuding confidence and assertiveness—a fitting posture for editorial or campaign photography. The overall mood is bold and chic, complemented by a sleek outfit and gloves that add an element of elegance.

poses.filename: Yoo Ah In Named PUMA Korea’s Newest Brand Ambassador.png
poses.imagePath: /assets/poses/Yoo Ah In Named PUMA Korea’s Newest Brand Ambassador.png
poses.description: The subject is standing in a full-body pose facing the camera with one hand casually placed in a pocket and the other arm bent, hand touching the head. The weight is shifted to one leg, with the other knee slightly bent. The head is tilted slightly to one side, creating a relaxed, confident posture with an editorial feel, suitable for a campaign.

The male model stands with a 3/4-angle posture, appearing confident and poised. His hands rest on his hips, accentuating a strong, editorial vibe. One knee is slightly bent, suggesting a casual, yet deliberate stance with the weight shifted, adding to the relaxed yet assured energy. The head is tilted slightly downwards, and the gaze is directed towards the ground, contributing to a thoughtful and introspective mood.
